features: Ulohy - profi modul so stavmi, prioritami, filtrami
Upozornenia - manualne a automaticke z pravidiel
Zjednotene CSV exporty - Excel-friendly (UTF-8 BOM, delimiter ;)
CSV helper modul pre konzistentne exporty
Vsetky exporty: tasks, stable-log, visit-log, vaccinations, documents, notifications, horses-licenses

changelog.6.11.4: Fix CSV export tasks - odstraneny JOIN
changelog.6.11.3: Fix tasks FK constraint na created_by
